commit.message:
semantics.c (finish_if_stmt_cond): Copy cond to permanent_obstack.

	* semantics.c (finish_if_stmt_cond): Copy cond to permanent_obstack.
	(finish_while_stmt_cond, finish_do_stmt, finish_for_cond): Likewise.

From-SVN: r27348

+	(finish_while_stmt_cond, finish_do_stmt, finish_for_cond): Likewise.

 1999-06-04  Nathan Sidwell  <nathan@acm.org>
